website_summaries.verdict: Harry's adventure into Lego land is exactly what you'd want it to be: charming, fun, and chock-full of secrets.
pros: Funny and charmingTons of variety and replay valueDownplays combat in favor of coin collectingLots of hidden nooks and crannies

customer_reviews.title: Great game to play with someone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game (23 year old male) as a game to play with my significant other. I have been playing video games since I was young, and this game was something I thought would interest her (since it's Harry Potter), but also be able to play together on the local co-op. We are about halfway through this game, and are looking forward to years 5-7. The only drawback I see is that the characters don't speak real words (more like just sounds), but yet that makes it more fun. I think people any age could enjoy this game if they enjoy the Lego world or the Harry Potter world.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gilhooly

customer_reviews.title: HP!!! Legos!!! Yay!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love HP!! Love legos!! Put them together and magic happens!! The only aspect of this game that I would change is the ability to skip the story lines. When playing it for the second or third time, I don't need to see Lego Harry and Lego Ron wandering around without words; I just want to play the game. But Lego HP is by far my favorite video game (aside from Super Mario Brothers 3). We now own this for Wii, Xbox, and PS3 for reasons I'm not entirely sure, but we're set!
customer_reviews.author: mel52088

customer_reviews.title: Kids say not worth allowance but not a bad gift
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE playing as their favorite characters. The music from the movie being in the levels makes them feel like they are really in Hogwarts. It is a short. They felt it is much shorter than the average game and limited replay value. But still fun!
customer_reviews.author: Honeymum

customer_reviews.title: It's a very simple yet enjoyable game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a child who loved the game. It takes you through the Lego version of the Harry Potter movies 1 - 4 years at Hogwarts. My child and I, having seen all the movies, enjoyed the Lego take on it. Unlocking new characters and finding new spells becomes addicting. The game took us about a week or so to beat so it has a decent amount of gameplay. It has some replay value as there are secrets you can only find if you have done almost everything.
customer_reviews.author: penname

customer_reviews.title: Holy addictive
customer_reviews.text: My family and I love this game. All of the Lego games are so much fun to play. It's great for little kids as well. My youngest is 7 and my oldest is 12 and they both love playing it. It's funny that the scences on the game are just like the exact scenes in the movie. The girls love spotting different scenes in the game and trying to remember where they saw it in the movie. It's a really fun game. I do have to say the next game which is years 5-7 is much better. But I suggest buying both and playing them for family game night.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Vogler

customer_reviews.title: Lot of fun one of the best lego games
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love playing all of the Lego games and this is one of the best. We love Harry potter so that probably plays a part in it but the game is a lot of fun. Just run around cast spells on everything and do your best harry potter impression. There a lot of items to unlock and a lot of replay ability. There are some glithes and it freezes every once in a while but it doesnt ruin the experience. If you like harry potter get this and years 5-7 and you'll have 40+ hours of fun on your hands

customer_reviews.title: Fun, cheeky, and just difficult enough to keep me playing

There's a lot to explore, the usual LEGO game cheeky humor, and it sticks pretty close to the plot of each movie and book. It's definitely more engaging and compelling than I expected.

product_meta.title: LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4
product_meta.description:
Build the adventure from Privet Drive to the Triwizard Tournament and experience the magic of the first four Harry Potter stories - LEGO style! Explore Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, learn spells, brew potions and relive the adventures like never before with tongue-in-cheek humor and creative customization that is unique to LEGO videogames!

AMAZON.COM


LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4 brings the action, adventure and fun of the first 4 stories in the Harry Potter catalog to the video game screen in the way only the LEGO franchise can. Featuring all your favorite characters and story environments, LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4 lets players play as the wizard of their choice, combining them piece by piece as is only possible in the LEGO franchise of games. Play options include single player story mode, free-play and two-player co-op online and offline.  


Relive adventures 1-4 LEGO style.
View larger. Relive the Adventures
Connect the bricks from Privet Drive to the Triwizard Tournament and experience the magic of the first four Harry Potter stories, LEGO style in LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4. Explore Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, learn spells, brew potions, and relive the adventures like never before with tongue-in-cheek humor and creative customization that is unique to LEGO video games.  Key Game Features 

 * Explore Interactive Environments - Explore iconic settings from the wizarding world including Hogwarts castle, Diagon Alley, the Forbidden Forest and the village of Hogsmeade. LEGO Hogwarts castle is a grand, immersive 3-D environment and the largest, most detailed LEGO game location ever built.
 * Your Favorite Characters - Play as Harry Potter, Ron Weasley, Hermione Granger as well as other favorite characters with over 100 possible options.
 * Be a Wizard - Attend lessons, cast spells, mix potions, fly on broomsticks, and complete tasks to earn points.
 * Co-op Multiplayer - Conjure up fun with a friend and play through Harry's first four years at Hogwarts as a team with drop-in, drop-out co-op play and online co-op available on Xbox LIVE.
 * Be Who You Want to Be - Be who you want to be anytime with character swapping and free-play abilities.
 * LEGO Gameplay Experience - Experience your favorite Harry Potter moments through the proven prism of the LEGO video game franchise.
